strongs_def: thoughtful, i.e. sagacious or discreet (implying a cautious character; while G4680 (φρόνιμος) denotes practical skill or acumen; and G4908 (φρόνιμος) indicates rather intelligence or mental acquirement); in a bad sense conceited (also in the comparative)
outline:
1. intelligent, wise
  2. prudent, i.e. mindful of one's interests
